rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment describes requirements using neutral language ('would be required to be euthanized').
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports factual information/action (euthanasia requirement) but contains no explicit calming cues.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes a requirement/procedure ('would be required to be euthanized to prevent the spread').
